short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used internally to make calls from our system with Teleforge integration. Allows for calls directly from our systems

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created by Picksmart and used by subsequent management systems to make and receive calls from the system

We use WebRTC to communicate with Teleforge. A company that manages Agents and telephone extensions. This allows our agents to communicate with our Leads. The chrome extension is merely the window through which we speak to our leads.

this allows calls to stay active in our multi page application instead of dying out when switching between pages.
